short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension keeps track of searches and results that you click on.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The goal of Research Assist is to improve your web browsing experience especially when doing research on a topic.  The method implemented in order to achieve this is by attempting to reduce the amount of thinking you need to do while researching something.  Another goal is to provide a convenience--we want to reduce the number of tabs and to free users from being forced to open links in new tabs during a research phase.  This extension adds bookmarks under Research Assist, the icon allows you to access a list of the current marks added.

This is a school project.  This is an open source project, source code is here: https://github.com/waterlgndx/ResearchAssist/
You can also fill out a survey for feedback: http://goo.gl/forms/L6WDOdIKlI
